document_data.name: Iron Guards
document_data.mainbody: The '''Iron Guards''' were a militant group tasked with defending [[Citadel Adbar]].
document_data.Equipment: They wore [[full plate|full plate armor]] and [[shield]]s, and carried [[Dwarven waraxe|war axe]]s.
